list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: Remove console.log statements from contact form
- This commit removes several console.log statements scattered throughout the contact form's client and server scripts. - The removal is aimed at cleaning up the code and improving performance by eliminating unnecessary logging.

task.summary: Default task

chore: Add exclusion for houdini and svelte-kit folders
- Exclusion for two new directories, '$houdini' and '.svelte-kit', has been included in the development module. - This prevents these directories from being indexed by the integrated development environment, thus optimizing its performance.

chore: Update dependencies versions
- Updated the versions of "@sveltejs/kit" from 2.5.7 to 2.5.8 and "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin", "@typescript-eslint/parser" from 7.8.0 to 7.9.0. - This will ensure compatibility with the most recent versions and fix potential issues in the previous versions.

fix: Update conditional rendering in Svelte components
- This commit properly handles the conditional rendering in both about and blog page Svelte components. - The change ensures the AboutPage and Blog components are only rendered if the corresponding data is available, preventing potential rendering errors.

refactor: comment out unnecessary elements
- In this commit, certain unnecessary elements were commented out to clean up the layout. - The order of CSS classes was also rearranged to ensure consistent styling across different sections of the website. - The stylistic changes improve readability of the code and overall user interface.

feat: Add link to Devologic icon in Footer component
- The Devologic icon in the footer component is now linked to the home page. - It ensures that users can navigate back to the main page easily by clicking the icon from anywhere on the site.

feat: Add link to Devologic icon in Footer component
- The Devologic icon in the footer component is now linked to the home page. - It ensures that users can navigate back to the main page easily by clicking the icon from anywhere on the site.

refactor: services page to dynamically load content
- The services page has been refactored to load dynamic content instead of static text. Section data including 'Marketing', 'E-Commerce', 'Search Engine Optimization' and 'Social Media Management' are now fetched from the back end. - This allows for more flexible content changes from the backend without requiring code updates.

chore: Add JSON support to houdini config
- The commit introduces a new JSON type handler to the houdini configuration file. - This now allows for marshalling and unmarshalling of JSON data, providing more flexibility when working with such data structures.

style: move language selection to bottom of footer
- The language selection dropdown has been moved to the bottom of the footer for improved UI design. - This change enhances visual hierarchy and ease of access for users.

fix: update function to handle empty or undefined input
- This commit modifies both the 'groupArrayIntoPairs' function and 'valuesParagraphs' assignment to handle cases when '$About.data.page.values.paragraphs' is empty or undefined. - Now, if the input is missing, it will default to an empty array, thereby preventing potential runtime errors.

style: move language selection to bottom of footer
- The language selection dropdown has been moved to the bottom of the footer for improved UI design. - This change enhances visual hierarchy and ease of access for users.

fix: update function to handle empty or undefined input
- This commit modifies both the 'groupArrayIntoPairs' function and 'valuesParagraphs' assignment to handle cases when '$About.data.page.values.paragraphs' is empty or undefined. - Now, if the input is missing, it will default to an empty array, thereby preventing potential runtime errors.

chore: remove locale-related actions in server routing
- This commit eliminates the actions related to handling locale on the server-side routing. - This includes the deletion of asynchronous functionality that was previously being used to manage language preferences based on form data and cookie settings.

chore: Reconfigure path alias from tsconfig to svelte config
- The path alias "@/*" referring to "./src/*" has been moved from the tsconfig.json file to the svelte.config.js file. - This change will streamline the path aliasing process across different environments and maintain consistent code structure.

chore: Add Node.js to jsLibraryMappings and exclude .vercel folder
An update was made to include the "Node.js Core" predefined library in the JavaScriptLibraryMappings. In addition, the ".vercel" folder is now excluded in the devologic.iml. This prevents unnecessary loading of the .vercel folder contents and allows the use of Node.js core in the project.

refactor: formatting
- Updated the project formatting for code consistency across multiple files including tsconfig.json, routes, favicon configurations, and client setup. - This involves adjustments for tabs, spacing, and line breaks. - This will enhance overall readability and maintainability of the codebase.

chore: remove commented-out CSS styling
- The commented-out CSS styling related to the body's background gradient in the [[lang]] route's style.css file has been removed. - This is to maintain the cleanliness of the code and to avoid potential confusion in future development.

refactor: CSS class ordering and handle null reference cases
- CSS classes in "LearnMoreSection.svelte" were reordered for consistency. - Additionally, type import in "blog/+page.svelte" was renamed from "PageServerData" to "PageData". - To handle potential null reference cases, optional chaining was added to the handling of page data in "partners/+page.svelte".
chore: Add Node.js to jsLibraryMappings and exclude .vercel folder

chore: Add Node.js to jsLibraryMappings and exclude .vercel folder
An update was made to include the "Node.js Core" predefined library in the JavaScriptLibraryMappings. In addition, the ".vercel" folder is now excluded in the devologic.iml. This prevents unnecessary loading of the .vercel folder contents and allows the use of Node.js core in the project.

chore: remove commented-out CSS styling
- The commented-out CSS styling related to the body's background gradient in the [[lang]] route's style.css file has been removed. - This is to maintain the cleanliness of the code and to avoid potential confusion in future development.

refactor: formatting
- Updated the project formatting for code consistency across multiple files including tsconfig.json, routes, favicon configurations, and client setup. - This involves adjustments for tabs, spacing, and line breaks. - This will enhance overall readability and maintainability of the codebase.

chore: update dependencies and remove comments in error.svelte file
- Updated the package.json and pnpm-lock.yaml files with new dependencies. - Also, unnecessary comments are removed from the error.svelte file. - The reordering of script commands in package.json for better readability. Introduced changes in the versions of dependencies will help to keep the project updated and efficient.
chore: Remove about, blog, blogpost and contact page

refactor: code for improved locale handling
- This commit includes a major refactor in the way locales are handled across the application. - It introduces a new way of setting up locale variables with more flexibility and robustness. - The locale variables have been converted from a key-indexed object to a keyed object for improved readability and understanding, making it easier for future contributors to understand and modify the code.

chore: Update about page query to use static ID
- The about page query has been updated to use a static ID instead of a dynamic one. - This change makes it easier to manage updates to the about page's content. - Moreover, it simplifies the way we identify and access the about page considering we use the same ID across different locales.

refactor: Update multiple routes and components for error handling
- Updated the routing and handling across several features in the Svelte app. - Also addressed issues with conditional rendering to better error-proof these components. - Implemented conditional chaining in display elements within multiple Svelte pages for safe attribute access.

fix: Add null-check to contact data retrieval
- Added a ternary operator to the contact data retrieval logic. - This change prevents potential errors that can arise when the ContactPage.data object is undefined, by falling back to an empty object instead.

feat: add Enhanced Images plugin to handle images more efficiently
The Enhanced Images plugin has been added and integrated into the configuration in vite.config.ts. This plugin provides advanced image handling features. Additionally, it has been applied to the partners' page for improved image handling. The plugin dependency has also been added to the package.json file and lock file.
refactor: change favicon

refactor: about page and update GraphQL query.
- Data destructuring has been improved in the about page by including 'lang' from data. - The display team information is updated to use data from the GraphQL query. - Sections of hardcoded text have been commented out in preparation for dynamic content. - The GraphQL query itself has been extended to include images within the team data.

feat: update logo images and switch to enhanced img tag in LogoClouds component
- The implementation in the LogoClouds component has been modified to use the 'enhanced:img' tag, replacing the standard 'img' tag for better performance. - Also, the source and alt texts of the logo images have been updated to new ones and the image's width is standardized for consistency and better layout.

feat: update logo images and switch to enhanced img tag in LogoClouds component
- The implementation in the LogoClouds component has been modified to use the 'enhanced:img' tag, replacing the standard 'img' tag for better performance. - Also, the source and alt texts of the logo images have been updated to new ones and the image's width is standardized for consistency and better layout.

refactor: about page and update GraphQL query.
- Data destructuring has been improved in the about page by including 'lang' from data. - The display team information is updated to use data from the GraphQL query. - Sections of hardcoded text have been commented out in preparation for dynamic content. - The GraphQL query itself has been extended to include images within the team data.

chore: Update devDependencies in package.json
- This commit upgrades the versions of the development dependencies in the package.json file. - It likewise updates corresponding versions in pnpm-lock.yaml. - These updates are crucial for optimal application performance and robustness, as they may carry important bug fixes and feature improvements.

fix: Update 404 error page text
- The text in the 404 error page has been slightly revised for clarity. - The contraction "couldn't" has been replaced with "could not" to maintain formal language across the site.

feat: Add Error component and update contact form handling
- The commit introduces an Error component in Svelte. This component will be used to display error messages related to form validation. - On the server side, a new page.server.ts file is created that includes form schema and server actions for form data handling. - Modifications are also made in the contact page file to integrate the server actions and error component for form validation. - Unnecessary script tag removed from app.html.

chore: Hide social media links in Footer
- The social media links in the Footer component have been commented out. - This change hides these links from the website's footer, but the code is kept for potential future use.

chore: Hide social media links in Footer
- The social media links in the Footer component have been commented out. - This change hides these links from the website's footer, but the code is kept for potential future use.

fix: Remove hardcoded values from contact form
- The hardcoded values for the fields firstName, lastName, email, and phoneNumber in the contact form have been removed. - This is necessary to ensure the fields are empty by default and to prevent any potential privacy issues.

chore: Hide image from +page.svelte
- The image loading from Unsplash has been commented out from the +page.svelte file.

feat: Add SEO metadata using svelte-meta-tags library
- The svelte-meta-tags library was integrated into the application to handle the SEO metadata. - The metadata was defined within the layout component, which includes title, description, open graph, twitter card information, and more. - Also, the previously hardcoded metadata in the 'app.html' and 'page.svelte' files was removed to avoid redundancies.

fix: Update clip-path identifiers in DevologicIconHorizontalDark.svelte
- The clip-path identifiers in src/lib/logos/DevologicIconHorizontalDark.svelte have been updated. - This change ensures proper referencing of these elements throughout the SVG code, promoting correct rendering and visual alignment.

chore: Update devDependencies version in package.json
- This commit updates several development dependencies in package.json. - Various packages such as `@sveltejs/adapter-cloudflare`, `@sveltejs/kit`, and `typescript` among others have been upgraded to newer versions. - This ensures we're using the latest functionality and security patches from these packages.
chore: eslint 9
chore: eslint 9

fix: Refactor GraphQL schema, reformatting comments
- Consolidate comment formatting to enhance schema readability and maintainability. - Adjusted comment indentation and placement for consistency across multiple input and type definitions.

chore: Update metadata for Devologic site structure
- Added a period to the description for consistency. - Updated image URLs and alt text to reflect the current branding of Devologic, ensuring all references are accurate and aligned with the company's visual identity.

chore: Remove console.log statements from contact form
- This commit removes several console.log statements scattered throughout the contact form's client and server scripts. - The removal is aimed at cleaning up the code and improving performance by eliminating unnecessary logging.
